<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">534ad6883b6e3a10bc1ccdd643e45ac7</macroponent><name>company/now_default/pattern</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const {
        isRequestSubmitted,
        request
    } = api.state;
    if (isRequestSubmitted && !request.company) {
        return [{
            status: "critical",
            content: "กรุณาระบุ",
            icon: "circle-info-outline"
        }];
    }
    return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-21 08:52:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>21f9d8c63beaf650bc1ccdd643e45a84</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>company/now_default/pattern</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_21f9d8c63beaf650bc1ccdd643e45a84</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-21 08:52:14</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
